Ward {1} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)[/i]
[i]Devoted Queen[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, create a Food token, then forge.
[i]Amiti [/i]– Whenever Elincia, Queen of Crimea attacks, if you control another Noble, she gains double strike until end of turn. If she is equipped, untap her and she gains flying until end of turn. If you gained 3 or more life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on her.
